destination_dock_external_id.description: Destination dock id of the purchase order from the company's external system

created_by_driver.description: Read-only. The driver that created the StopAlert.

created_by_user.description: Read-only. The user that created the StopAlert.

provider_specific_packaging.description: Provider-specific type of packaging used for the product

origin_dock_external_id.description: Origin dock id of the purchase order from the company's external system

created_by_driver.description: Read-only. The driver that created the StopAlert.

created_by_user.description: Read-only. The user that created the StopAlert.

overall_status.description: Read-only status of a purchase order that, if no transit_status exists, will describe shipment assignment

additional_bol_recipients.description: Additional email address to send the BOL to upon booking

capacity_provider_customer_reference_num.description: Customer reference number that came back from the capacity provider

reported_at.description: Time when the shipment was at the address

display_name.description:
Read-only name of the Carrier which will be its dba_name if one
exists, else the Carrier's Company's name

display_primary_email.description:
Read-only email of the Carrier which will be its email if one
exists, else the Carrier's Company's email

display_primary_phone_number.description:
Read-only phone number of the Carrier which will be its phone number if one
exists, else the Carrier's Company's phone number

provider_specific_packaging.description: Provider-specific type of packaging used for the product

purchase_order.description: Optional id of PurchaseOrder to which line item is associated

purchase_order_line_item_id.description: Optional id of PurchaseOrderLineItem to which shipment line item is associated

bill_to_override.description: Collection of bill-to information that will render on Shipment documents

customer_side_accessorial_charge_table.description: Link to the AccessorialChargeTable used to access charges on the shipment customer

customer_side_fuel_surcharge_table.description: Link to the FuelSurchargeTable used to access charges on the shipment customer

vendor_side_accessorial_charge_table.description: Link to the AccessorialChargeTable used to access charges on the shipment vendor

vendor_side_fuel_surcharge_table.description: Link to the FuelSurchargeTable used to access charges on the shipment vendor

mode.description: Standardized code for a shipment mode

is_3pl.description: True if the Brokerage is actually a 3PL

display_name.description:
Read-only name of the Carrier which will be its dba_name if one
exists, else the Carrier's Company's name

display_primary_email.description:
Read-only email of the Carrier which will be its email if one
exists, else the Carrier's Company's email

display_primary_phone_number.description:
Read-only phone number of the Carrier which will be its phone number if one
exists, else the Carrier's Company's phone number

feature_flags.description:
Read-only set of boolean flags that describe what features
a Company has enabled

alerts_dashboard_enabled.description: Flag that allows a company to use alerts dashboard

automatic_carrier_policy_enabled.description: Flag that allows for automatic carrier policy feature to be enabled

bid_manager_enabled.description: Flag that allows users to use the bid manager feature

can_book_manual_shipments.description:
Flag that notifies the frontend whether or not
it should display manual shipment booking pages

can_initiate_mobile_ping_tracking.description: Flag that allows a company to initiate cell phone ping tracking requests

can_override_bill_to_for_automated_ltl.description:
Flag that notifies the frontend whether or not to render
bill-to override dialog for autobook LTL shipments

carrier_prioritization_enabled.description: Flag that allows users of the company to access the carrier prioritization features.

ch_robinson_enabled.description: Flag that allows shipments created by Company to create and delete CHR Orders if CHR customer code is also set

contracts_enabled.description: Flag that allows user to use contracts and SLAs

edi_invoicing_enabled.description: Flag that allows a company to dispatch invoices via EDI

freightwaves_driver_texts_enabled.description: Temp flag that allows user to see the freightwaves demo functionality

ftl_instant_rates_enabled.description: Flag that enables a companies usage of FTL Instant Rates

genesis_ltl_enabled.description: Flag that allows a company to access Genesis LTL

historical_pricing_enabled.description: Flag that allows user to view historical pricing data visualization

integrations_enabled.description: Flag that enables third party applications supported on the platform capability

invoicing_enabled.description: Flag that allows users of the company to access invoicing features.

load_board_enabled.description: Flag that allows users of the company to post shipments to the load board

netsuite_enabled.description: Flag that allows a company to use Netsuite

new_dashboard_enabled.description: Flag that allows user to see the new dashboard views

order_consolidation_workflows_enabled.description: Flag that allows a company to use order consolidation workflows

policies_enabled.description: Flag that allows user to use policies

purchase_orders_enabled.description: Flag that enables purchase order capability

rate_tables_enabled.description: Flag that allows fuel and accessorial rate tables to be rendered

rmis_enabled.description: Flag that enables syncing carrier profile data from RMIS

saferwatch_enabled.description: Flag that enables syncing carrier profile data from SaferWatch

send_shipwell_network_enabled.description: Flag that allows users to send quotes to the shipwell network

shipment_details_redesign_enabled.description: Flag that allows for enabling usage of newly redesigned shipment detail

show_load_board.description: Flag that notifies the frontend whether or not to display the load board

stop_status_enabled.description: Flag that allows stop statuses to be enabled

supplier_invites_enabled.description: Flag that enables a company from sending supplier invite links

triumph_pay_enabled.description: Flag that enables company to use the Triumph Pay integration

uses_3pl_quoting_flow.description: Flag that instructs frontend to render the 3PL-specific quoting flow

customer_charge_line_items.description:
Costs owed to vendor as the customer records them,
readable by both customer and vendor but writable
only by the customer

amount.description: Total amount of the line item, or unit_amount times unit_quantity

charge_code.description: Standardized code for a type of line item charge

unit_amount.description: Cost of one unit of the line item

unit_name.description: Descriptor for one unit of the line item

prepaid_amount.description: Amount on the charge line item that is prepaid. Assumed to always be in the currency of the unit amount

vendor_assignment.description: Id of the VendorAssignment to which this line item is related

items.description:
Line item recording a charge that some vendor is charging
their customer for a shipment

reps.description:
Representatives for the Shipment from within the requesting user's
own company

items.description: User serving as a responsible party for a Shipment

role.description: Role a ShipmentRep has on a Shipment

rfqs.description: All RFQs this Shipment has run, slimmed down to exclude their quotes

autoquote.description: Whether or not this RFQ should perform an autoquoting process

did_finish_autoquote.description: Whether or not this RFQ completed an autoquoting process

restrict_autoquote_to_companies.description:
Array of Companies that, if provided, the autoquoting process
will restrict its quote results to only rates that come
from those vendor companies

shipment.description: Id of the Shipment for which this RFQ was created

items.description: Standardized code for a shipment mode

spot_negotiations.description: All SpotNegotiation ids of the RFQ

service_level.description: Standardized code for a shipment service level

created_by_driver.description: Read-only. The driver that created the StopAlert.

created_by_user.description: Read-only. The user that created the StopAlert.

initial_window_end.description: End of the initial estimate of ETA window

initial_window_start.description: Start of the initial estimate of ETA window

running_window_end.description: Start of the most recent estimate of ETA window

running_window_start.description: Start of the most recent estimate of ETA window

confirmed_arrival_at.description: Optional of when the driver first arrived at the Stop

confirmed_departure_at.description: Optional of when the Stop was departed

eta_overridden_by.description: ID of user who marked ETA as overridden, if exists

is_completed.description: Whether or not the Stop was completed

user.description: Id of the user that this PointOfContact refers

planned_date.description: Planned date of the stop, in string of the form YYYY-MM-DD

initial_window_end.description: End of the initial estimate of ETA window

initial_window_start.description: Start of the initial estimate of ETA window

running_window_end.description: Start of the most recent estimate of ETA window

running_window_start.description: Start of the most recent estimate of ETA window

items.description: An event that took place during the life of the shipment

account.description: Id of the FedexAccount to dispatch or rate with, if using FedEx direct rating or dispatch

fedex_specific_options.description: Shipment rating and dispatch options specific to FedEx

display_name.description:
Read-only name of the Carrier which will be its dba_name if one
exists, else the Carrier's Company's name

display_primary_email.description:
Read-only email of the Carrier which will be its email if one
exists, else the Carrier's Company's email

display_primary_phone_number.description:
Read-only phone number of the Carrier which will be its phone number if one
exists, else the Carrier's Company's phone number

amount.description: Total amount of the line item, or unit_amount times unit_quantity

charge_code.description: Standardized code for a type of line item charge

unit_amount.description: Cost of one unit of the line item

unit_name.description: Descriptor for one unit of the line item

quote.description: Id of the Quote to which this line item is related

currency.description: Read-only currency code describing the currency of line items on the quote

customer_markup.description:
Markup charge to the end customer, obfuscated so only authorized
users can read/write its true value

delivery_date.description: Planned delivery date of the shipment, in string of the form YYYY-MM-DD

display_earliest_pickup.description: Human-readable date/time of earliest pickup, if one exists

earliest_pickup_date.description: Earliest date the shipment could be run, in string of the form YYYY-MM-DD

earliest_pickup_time.description: Earliest time the shipment could be run

info_message.description: Description of caveats about the quote

is_csp_rate.description:
True iff Quote originated from a rate that a Brokerage negotiated
on behalf of one of their FreightAuthorities

is_failure.description:
if true, this Quote does not represent an actual price
but instead a failure to provide a Quote to an RFQ

mode.description: Standardized code for a shipment mode

provider_logo_url.description: URL for the logo of the quote provider

rfq.description: Id of the RFQ to which this quote is related

service_level.description: Standardized code for a shipment service level

total.description: Sum of all the charge line items of this quote

category.description: Code the charge category for this line item

unit_amount.description: Amount of a single unit of this line item

unit_amount_currency.description: 3 letter code of currency for this line item. If not provided, assumed to be USD.

delivery_date.description: requested delivery date for this tender (in YYYY-MM-DD format)

earliest_pickup_date.description: Earliest date tender is available for pickup (in YYYY-MM-DD format)

earliest_pickup_time.description: Earliest time tender is available for pickup (in HH:MM:SS format)

equipment_type.description: machine_readable string of the EquipmentType requested for this tender.

error_message.description: Open-ended field for error information regarding this tender

expires_at.description: Datetime that this tender expires at.

info_message.description: Open-ended field for other information regarding this tender e.g special instructions

lane_type.description: machine_readable string of the LaneType (formerly QuoteLaneType) requested for this tender.

latest_pickup_date.description: Latest date tender is available for pickup (in YYYY-MM-DD format)

latest_pickup_time.description: Latest time tender is available for pickup (in HH:MM:SS format)

reference_number.description: Reference number/string for this tender. Primarially for references from external systems.

transit_days.description: Number of days scheduled for transit

accepted_at.description: Datetime that the tender was accepted at or null if not accepted.

display_name.description:
Read-only name of the Carrier which will be its dba_name if one
exists, else the Carrier's Company's name

display_primary_email.description:
Read-only email of the Carrier which will be its email if one
exists, else the Carrier's Company's email

display_primary_phone_number.description:
Read-only phone number of the Carrier which will be its phone number if one
exists, else the Carrier's Company's phone number

created_by_company_id.description: UUID of company that created this tender

created_by_user_id.description: UUID of user that created this tender (if known)

expires_at.description: Datetime the tender expires or null if it doesn't expire.

mode.description: Standardized code for a shipment mode

rejected_at.description: Datetime the tender was rejected or null if not rejected.

revoked_at.description: Datetime the tender was revoked by the shipper or null if not revoked.

service_level.description: Standardized code for a shipment service level

shipment_id.description: UUID of the shipment this tender is for

is_3pl.description: True if the Brokerage is actually a 3PL

display_name.description:
Read-only name of the Carrier which will be its dba_name if one
exists, else the Carrier's Company's name

display_primary_email.description:

bid_manager_enabled.description: Flag that allows users to use the bid manager feature

can_book_manual_shipments.description:
Flag that notifies the frontend whether or not
it should display manual shipment booking pages

can_initiate_mobile_ping_tracking.description: Flag that allows a company to initiate cell phone ping tracking requests

can_override_bill_to_for_automated_ltl.description:
Flag that notifies the frontend whether or not to render
bill-to override dialog for autobook LTL shipments

carrier_prioritization_enabled.description: Flag that allows users of the company to access the carrier prioritization features.

ch_robinson_enabled.description: Flag that allows shipments created by Company to create and delete CHR Orders if CHR customer code is also set

contracts_enabled.description: Flag that allows user to use contracts and SLAs

edi_invoicing_enabled.description: Flag that allows a company to dispatch invoices via EDI

freightwaves_driver_texts_enabled.description: Temp flag that allows user to see the freightwaves demo functionality

ftl_instant_rates_enabled.description: Flag that enables a companies usage of FTL Instant Rates

genesis_ltl_enabled.description: Flag that allows a company to access Genesis LTL

historical_pricing_enabled.description: Flag that allows user to view historical pricing data visualization

integrations_enabled.description: Flag that enables third party applications supported on the platform capability

invoicing_enabled.description: Flag that allows users of the company to access invoicing features.

load_board_enabled.description: Flag that allows users of the company to post shipments to the load board

netsuite_enabled.description: Flag that allows a company to use Netsuite

new_dashboard_enabled.description: Flag that allows user to see the new dashboard views

order_consolidation_workflows_enabled.description: Flag that allows a company to use order consolidation workflows

policies_enabled.description: Flag that allows user to use policies

purchase_orders_enabled.description: Flag that enables purchase order capability

rate_tables_enabled.description: Flag that allows fuel and accessorial rate tables to be rendered

rmis_enabled.description: Flag that enables syncing carrier profile data from RMIS

saferwatch_enabled.description: Flag that enables syncing carrier profile data from SaferWatch

send_shipwell_network_enabled.description: Flag that allows users to send quotes to the shipwell network

shipment_details_redesign_enabled.description: Flag that allows for enabling usage of newly redesigned shipment detail

show_load_board.description: Flag that notifies the frontend whether or not to display the load board

stop_status_enabled.description: Flag that allows stop statuses to be enabled

supplier_invites_enabled.description: Flag that enables a company from sending supplier invite links

triumph_pay_enabled.description: Flag that enables company to use the Triumph Pay integration

uses_3pl_quoting_flow.description: Flag that instructs frontend to render the 3PL-specific quoting flow

account.description: Id of the UPSAccount to dispatch or rate

ups_specific_options.description: Shipment rating and dispatch options specific to UPS

account.description: Id of the USPSAccount to dispatch or rate

usps_specific_options.description: Shipment rating and dispatch options specific to USPS
